extendedInfo.description: Emergency Backpack is a multi-tool application containing a selection of useful items, brought together in one handy package. Each of the four sections (Personal Alarm, In Case of Emergency, First Aid Guide, and Torch) has been created to provide superb functionality, whilst maintaining a simple and attractive appearance. All four sections possess home screen widgets, providing fast and easy access to every part of the application. The backpacks elegant design, intuitive navigation system and user friendly interface, all help to make this tool both easy to use and exceptionally effective.Personal AlarmThe personal alarm provides users with an effective weapon against would be attackers. The alarm emits a high pitched noise, helping to deter attackers whilst drawing attention to your situation.In Case of EmergencyThe ICE section can provide medical professionals with easy access to a predetermined ICE contacts list, as well as user specific medical information. This information can then be made accessible to emergency personnel through the use of an ICE home screen widget. First Aid GuideThis guide contains up to date information which can help you deal with a wide range of emergencies and other first aid situations. The guide is split into relevant subsections and information pages use a handy colour code system, allowing users easy access to relevant data.TorchThe torch offers a simple and elegant replacement to traditional torches. It supports both screen and flash modes (device hardware permitting). It can automatically set brightness levels, and provides an option to toggle between screen and flash modes (where available). The tool's user friendly interface and simple control system all help to provide you with a handy light, to illuminate those dark places.

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
reviews.comment: This app is great! It holds ALL your information in it, including you insurance info and everything else, from meds to family history. A must have!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Features
reviews.comment: Really like this app. Five stars if ICE widget on lock screen were read only or just not so easy to change if person viewing is twitchy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: WARNING: this app uses \"Mob fox\", to collect ur phone ID, etc, & location, then transmit ur data UNENCRYPTED... Recommend install Lookout app \"add network detector\", to scan ur device, for a better understanding of what apps like this also do \'behind the scenes\'... :(
reviews.author: Fred Merritt

reviews.title: Looks nice
reviews.comment: But the constant force closes on just about everything I look at is annoying. HTC G2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great 4 in 1
reviews.comment: Great app, I love that you get four apps in one. Very handy.
reviews.author: A Google User
